S04n359:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'nupūrveṇa dharmagrāmaṃ gatvā yena śivarāgro brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04n359:2: tenopasaṃkramya śivarāgrasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam |
S04n359:3: na ca jānāmi-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n359:5: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadādīti |
S04n359:6: tadvadatu me āryaḥ-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n359:9: yena satyena satyavacanena tryadhvasu na kaścidbodhisattvo'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervivṛttaḥ,
S04n359:12: tena satyavacanādhiṣṭhānena idaṃ ca me kāryaṃ smṛdhyatviti |
S04n359:16: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ satyānuparivartanī vākpratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum ||
S04n359:21: tāvupasaṃkramya paripṛccha kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n359:23: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahādharmagauravamutpādya śivarāgrasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya śivarāgraṃ brāhmaṇamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥpunaravalokya śivarāgrasya brāhmaṇasyāntikātprakrāntaḥ ||50 ||
